title: 3 Days to Kill
description: A terminally ill secret agent accepts a risky mission in exchange for an experimental drug that might save him – if he can survive its side effects.

title: Skin Trade
description: A New Jersey detective whose family was killed by an international gangster teams up with a Bangkok cop on a quest to bring down a criminal empire.

title: The Prince
description: A former Mafia hit man living quietly as a mechanic veers back into his old world after his daughter is abducted and faces an old foe in New Orleans.
